description: This file is a minified/concatenated JavaScript library implementing web components polyfills, including URL parsing, WeakMap, MutationObserver, HTMLTemplateElement, and performance/requestAnimationFrame polyfills, used in the Polymer project.

classes.name: HTMLTemplateElement
classes.description: Polyfill for HTMLTemplateElement, enabling template content handling and innerHTML property.

classes.name: JsMutationObserver
classes.description: Polyfill for MutationObserver, observing DOM mutations.

classes.name: WeakMap
classes.description: Polyfill for WeakMap for environments lacking native support.

methods.name: HTMLTemplateElement.decorate
methods.description: Decorates a template element to handle content and innerHTML.

methods.name: HTMLTemplateElement.bootstrap
methods.description: Initializes all template elements in a document.

methods.name: JsMutationObserver.observe
methods.description: Starts observing a DOM node for mutations.

methods.name: JsMutationObserver.takeRecords
methods.description: Returns a list of mutation records.
